report.title: Almost Death
report.author: matty
report.bodytext: /n /n /n I suggest being very careful when doing this. Actually I do not recomend it at all. I got a 50mcg Fentanyl patch. Put it on my toungue, got the whole dose at once. Got an Extremely nice high. Body...mindeverything. /n /n I get to my house... then the next thing I know paramedics are all around me and my dad is shaking me. Apparently I stopped breathing and was almost dead the EMT said. Other people had experiences like this one also so I have read. People please be carefull doses of Fentanyl are VERY strong when you put the patch in your mouth. fuckin A
